stimulusHtml: Using the models, S ( t ) and L ( t ) = − 80 + 4400 t 2 − 14 t + 55 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4B1B@ , find the time t , 0 ≤ t ≤ 12 , at which the number of shoppers in the store is the greatest. Justify your answer.

features.html:
The following are related to this scenario:

A store is having a 12-hour sale. The total number of shoppers who have entered the store t hours after the sale begins is modeled by the function S defined byS(t)=0.5t4−16t3+144t2 for 0 ≤ t ≤ 12 . At time t=0 , when the sale begins, there are no shoppers in the store.
